### 2025-03-28: OA Datenpraxis Webinar: Erfassung von Publikationskosten an wissenschaftlichen Einrichtungen in Deutschland

The webinar will present  results of a survey conducted in 2024 as part of the project OA Datenpraxis.
The event will take place on 28.03.2025 from 10:00 to 11:00 CET via Zoom.
